title: Book Review: ‘Surrender,’ by Bono
description: In his new book, “Surrender,” the singer remembers hanging out with everyone from the Edge to Bill Gates.
dc:creator: Alan Light

media:content.media:credit: Chad Batka for The New York Times
media:content.media:description: Bono the memoirist wrestles with “the pseudo-religious part of being a rock star, how we put the messy in messianic.”
